verses.verse: Seven <WH7651> women <WH802> shall take hold <WH2388> of one <WH259> man <WH376> in that day, <WH3117> saying, <WH559> "We will eat <WH398> our own bread, <WH3899> and wear <WH3847> our own clothing: <WH8071> only let us be called <WH7121> by your name. <WH8034> Take away <WH622> our reproach. <WH2781>"

In that day, <WH3117> Yahweh <WH3068>'s branch <WH6780> will be beautiful <WH6643> and glorious, <WH3519> and the fruit <WH6529> of the land <WH776> will be the beauty <WH1347> and glory of <WH8597> the survivors <WH6413> of Israel. <WH3478>

It will happen, <WH7604> that he who is left in Zion, <WH6726> and he who remains <WH3498> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> shall be called <WH559> holy, <WH6918> even everyone who is written <WH3789> among the living <WH2416> in Jerusalem; <WH3389>

when the Lord <WH136> shall have washed away <WH7364> the filth <WH6675> of the daughters <WH1323> of Zion, <WH6726> and shall have purged <WH1740> the blood <WH1818> of Jerusalem <WH3389> from its midst, <WH7130> by the spirit <WH7307> of justice, <WH4941> and by the spirit <WH7307> of burning. <WH1197>

Yahweh <WH3068> will create <WH1254> over the whole habitation <WH4349> of Mount <WH2022> Zion, <WH6726> and over her assemblies, <WH4744> a cloud <WH6051> and smoke <WH6227> by day, <WH3119> and the shining <WH5051> of a flaming <WH3852> fire <WH784> by night; <WH3915> for over all the glory <WH3519> will be a canopy. <WH2646>
There will be a pavilion <WH5521> for a shade <WH6738> in the daytime <WH3119> from the heat, <WH2721> and for a refuge <WH4268> and for a shelter <WH4563> from storm <WH2230> and from rain. <WH4306>
